verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] drawn a line in the sand on immigration legislation - it will either include a border wall or he wo n't sign it .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: drawn] [ARG1: a line in the sand on immigration legislation] - it will either include a border wall or he wo n't sign it .
President Donald Trump has drawn a line in the sand on immigration legislation - it [V: will] either include a border wall or he wo n't sign it .
President Donald Trump has drawn a line in the sand on immigration legislation - [ARG2: it] [ARGM-MOD: will] either [V: include] [ARG1: a border wall] or he wo n't sign it .
President Donald Trump has drawn a line in the sand on immigration legislation - it will either include a border wall or he [V: wo] n't sign it .
President Donald Trump has drawn a line in the sand on immigration legislation - it will either include a border wall or [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: sign] [ARG1: it] .
